citation: Proclamation under the Mutual Recognition (Tasmania) Amendment Act 2021 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Mutual Recognition (Tasmania) Amendment Act 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Mutual Recognition (Tasmania) Amendment Act 2021 fix 22 December 2021 as the day on which that Act commences.

13 December 2021

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

MICHAEL DARREL JOSEPH FERGUSON

Minister for Finance

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 22 December 2021

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Treasury and Finance.
